Frequently Asked Questions

Quick answers to common questions

How do I get started with Creator OS?

Simply sign up for a free account and you'll have immediate access to the dashboard. No credit card required!

What's included in the free plan?

The free plan includes 5 channel ideas per month, 10 content packs, basic analytics, and access to our AI tools directory.

Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?

Yes! You can upgrade or downgrade at any time from your account settings. Changes take effect immediately.

Do you offer refunds?

We offer a 30-day money-back guarantee on all premium plans. No questions asked.

How can I report a bug?

Use the contact form above and select 'Bug Report' as the subject. Include as much detail as possible.
